uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.model

Class LoadXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.model.LoadXML

  • public final class LoadXML
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class implements the Singleton pattern. This class contains the interface the system uses to download the XML data files as well as parsing such files.
    Author:
    Karl Parry (kdp8)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      LoadXML()

      This method provides the interface to download an XML file located on a predefined URL stored in the strings.xml file under the name URL.

      This method provides the interface to read an XML walk file stored locally on the device.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadXML

        public boolean downloadXML(Context context,
                  java.lang.String filename)
        This method provides the interface to download an XML file located on a predefined URL stored in the strings.xml file under the name URL.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the Activity implementing this method.
        filename - the filename of the XML file to be downloaded. Including the .xml extension.
        Returns:
        boolean value. True if successful or false if failed.

      • downloadXML

        public boolean downloadXML(Context context,
                  java.lang.String filename,
                  java.lang.String directory)
        This method provides the interface to download an XML file located on a predefined URL stored in the strings.xml file under the name URL.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the Activity implementing this method.
        filename - the filename of the XML file to be downloaded. Including the .xml extension.
        directory - the folder name under the URL where the XML file is located. Walks are under the walks folder.
        Returns:
        boolean value. True if successful or false if failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if the context is null or if file name is null. Pass the context as "this" from the Activity implementing this function it

      • downloadXML

        public boolean downloadXML(Context context,
                  java.lang.String filename,
                  java.lang.String directory,
                  boolean temp)

      • readXMLMap

        public java.util.ArrayList<Walk> readXMLMap(Context context,
                                   java.lang.String filename)
        This method provides the interface to read an XML map file stored locally on the device. The XML map file contains the details about each of the available walk such as unique ID, title and description.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the Activity implementing this method.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the walk details of the XML map file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if the context is null. Pass the context as "this" from the Activity implementing this function it

      • readWalk

        public Walk readWalk(Context context,
            java.lang.String walkid)
        This method provides the interface to read an XML walk file stored locally on the device. The XML walk file contains the details about a specific walk.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the Activity implementing this method.
        walkid - the unique ID linked to the walk which will be read.
        Returns:
        a Walk object containing the walk details.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if the context is null or walk is null. Pass the context as "this" from the Activity implementing this function it
